comment_text: Promises are better than callbacks but far worse (in terms of complexity they create) that synchronous code.   This might be fairy dust but it crushes promises for reducing developer cognitive load.   Having said that I agree with the person who commented that async/await is a better way to go (although sadly not really an option in CS yet).
author: eagsalazar2
story_title: Syncify.js – Eliminates the need for callbacks in the browser
